ConceptDef.label: Dual wielding penalties
ConceptDef.helpText: Dual wielding doesn't come without penalties. Both the cooldown time (time a pawn can't do anything after taking a shot), and the shooting accuracy get a penalty that is configurable in the mod settings. This penalty depends heavily on the skill (melee for melee weapons, and shooting for ranged weapons) of the pawn. Letting you lvl 1 shooting skill pawn dual wield guns might not be such a good idea!

ConceptDef.label: Dual Wield mod settings
ConceptDef.helpText: Don't forget to check out the mod settings for dual wielding. If there's something you don't like about the mod, you'll likely find a setting there that solves your issue.
